title: BRIEF-Mesoblast Says Co & Lonza Enter Agreement For Commercial Manufacture Of Co's Allogeneic Cell Therapy
text:
BRIEF-Mesoblast Says Co & Lonza Enter Agreement For Commercial Manufacture Of Co's Allogeneic Cell Therapy

Stock Markets 8 minutes ago (Oct 17, 2019 12:42)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Mesoblast Says Co & Lonza Enter Agreement For Commercial Manufacture Of Co's Allogeneic Cell Therapy Oct 17 (Reuters) - Mesoblast : * CO & LONZA ENTER AGREEMENT FOR COMMERCIAL MANUFACTURE OF MESOBLAST'S POTENTIAL FIRST UNITED STATES ALLOGENEIC CELL THERAPY * EXPECTS TO COMPLETE FILING OF ROLLING BIOLOGICS LICENSE APPLICATION SUBMISSION TO US FDA BY THE END OF THIS YEAR

BRIEF-Mesoblast Says Co & Lonza Enter Agreement For Commercial Manufacture Of Co's Allogeneic Cell Therapy
